channel.title: AI on Jordi Smit
channel.description: Recent content in AI on Jordi Smit

item.title: What does it take to add Copilot to Obsidian?
item.description: Ever since I got access to GitHub Copilot, I have been truly amazed by its capabilities. It continuously keeps feeding me possible completions for my code and text.

item.title: AI based transcription in the browser
item.description: OpenAI whisper is an automatic speech recognition system that can transform any speech in audio or video file into written text.
